title: Amin Elhassan on His Phoenix Suns Days, Shaq Locker Room Stories, and More | Real Ones
description:
Amin Elhassan of Meadowlark Media joins Logan and Raja to talk about his days working in the Phoenix Suns’ front office (1:00), how the team fell from grace (16:30), Shaq locker room stories (35:00), and more.
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Guest: Amin Elhassan
